name: get_column_unique_values
description: Retrieves a list of unique values from a specified column in an Excel or CSV file.

file_path.description: The full path of the Excel (.xlsx, .xls) or CSV (.csv) file to be analyzed.

sheet_name.description: Name or index of the Excel sheet to read. Ignored for CSV files.

column_name.description: The column name from which unique values should be extracted.
